metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20011 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: In getArray of NotificationManagerService.java , there is a possible leak of one user notifications to another due to missing check. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-12 Android-12LAndroid ID: A-214999128

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
